Reporting Railroad Name: NORTHEAST ILLINOIS REGIONAL COMMUTER RAIL CORP. -- METRA
Maintenance Railroad Name: NORTHEAST ILLINOIS REGIONAL COMMUTER RAIL CORP. -- METRA
Primary Accident Cause: Other general switching rules (Provide detailed  description in narrative)
Contributing Accident Cause: Spring Switch not cleared before reversing
Accident Cause: Other general switching rules (Provide detailed  description in narrative)
Narrative: TRAIN ME705 WAS TRAVELLING ON TRACK 2 WHEN IT DERAILED INTO TRAIN ME140 WHICH WAS STOPPED ON TRACK 3.  THE COLLISION/DERAILMENT OCCURRED ON TRACKS 2 AND 3 IN THE UNIVERSITY PARK YARD AT MP 31.30.  ME140 HAD A THREE-MEMBER CREW AND FOUR CAR CONSIST AND WAS ON TRACK 3 AND IN THE CLEAR WHILE ME705 WITHA FOUR-MEMBER CREW AND SIX CAR CONSIST WAS PUTTING THEIR TRAIN AWAY ON TRACK 2. ME705 WAS SCHEDULEDTO ARRIVE AND TERMINATE AT UNIVERSITY PARK. ME705 ARRIVED ON THE WEST SIDE OF THE PLATFORM AND ALLTHEIR PASSENGERS WERE LET OFF. AFTER THEY WERE ALL OFF THE CREW WAS GOING TO OUT THEIR TRAIN IN THECLEAR INTO TRACK 2 IN UNIVERSITY PARK YARD. THE STUDENT ASSISTANT CONDUCTOR AND THE CONDUCTOR WHO WAS IN CHARGE GOT OFF THEIR TRAIN AND WALKED TO THE 2/3 SWITCH. THE MOVEMENT WENT SOUTH INTO TRACK 2 WITH FIVE OF THE SIX CARS ALREADY SOUTH OF THE 2/3 SWITCH WHEN THE STUDENT ASSISTANT CONDUCTOR THREWTHE SWITCH UNDER THE SIXTH AND FINAL CAR. THE LAST CAR ON ME705 WAS 1262 WITH THE LEADING TRUCKS HEADING INTO TRACK 2 AND THE TRAILING TRUCKS INTO TRACK 3 WHERE ME140 WAS PARKED AND IN THE CLEAR. ME140 WAS SCHEDULED TO DEPART UNIVERSITY PARK AT 18:40 FOR RANDOLPH STATION. NEITHER TRAIN HAD PASSENGERS ON BOARD, NO CROSSINGS WERE CLOSED AND OR AFFECTED.THE FIREMAN’S SIDE OF 1262 STRUCK THE ENGINEER’S SIDE OF 1266 CAUSING ALL FOUR TRUCKS ON BOTH CARS TO DERAIL.  INITIAL ESTIMATED DAMAGE IS $1.2 MILLION. MAN HOURS CONFIRMED.
